cast.overview: Following the events at home, the Abbott family now face the terrors of the outside world. Forced to venture into the unknown, they realize that the creatures that hunt by sound are not the only threats that lurk beyond the sand path.
cast.title: A Quiet Place Part II

details.biography: Kyle Licht is a filmmaker, musician, and writer based in Western New York. He graduated from SUNY Fredonia with a Bachelor's of Science in Communication and a Bachelor's of Art in Interdisciplinary Studies. He is cofounder and CEO of Makunema Productions, a video production company focusing in creative content as well as client work in photography and videography. His focus is in writing, directing, and producing films. He's also an editor, photographer, cinematographer, pianist, and sound designer. Kyle has a great interest in helping others, environmentalism, analyzing films and music, and inspiring people and making them laugh.
details.name: Kyle Licht
